Package controller

Class BetterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.SimpleController
      • controller.BetterController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GUIController
    public class BetterController
extends SimpleController
    This BetterController class uses a BetterStockModel, allowing for the tracking of portfolios over-time. Along with various enhancements from the first iteration of the controller, SimpleController including, re-balancing a variable amount of stocks, plotting the value of stocks and portfolio's, and of various support for behaviour of the BetterPortfolio interface. This class extends the core commands of the SimpleController, while the execution of those commands are now based on a BetterStockModel, which has the functionality of the StockModel, but implements that functionality differently (see BetterStockModel for more).

    • Constructor Detail

      • BetterController

        public BetterController​(BetterStockModel model,
                        java.lang.Readable readable,
                        AdvancedStockView stockView)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new BetterController object with the given model, readable, and view. If the model, readable, or stockView is null, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        model - the BetterStockModel object to interact with stock data and user information
        readable - the Readable object for inputs.
        stockView - the AdvancedStockView object to display the results of the model's actions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the model, readable, or stockView is null
